name: Achievement Lurker: Respectable Accomplishment
description:
The world of Ashendalila is a dark and terrible place, but one hero will outshine the rest. To accomplish what most dream of, but a heroes' work is never done. Monsters roam the world and try to stop the accomplishers from accomplishing the accomplishment. The Accomplishment is a ritual used to eradicate monsters also known as the white knights in this world. These white knights strive to destroy anything that they deem unworthy or just take no interest to. Instead of leaving everything alone they must fester it, our hero says No! and strives to fight the long fight.

  • Level Up
  • Traditional RPG Battle Engine
  • Venture in the land of Ashendalila
  • Inventory & Skill System
  • 5000 Achievements
